Medium: Illustrated book with 6 etchings (including 1 after Tanguy drawing), 3 with lift ground aquatint, aquatint, drypoint, engraving, and/or roulette; 3 drypoints (1 with engraving); 1 engraving; 2 woodcuts; 1 lithograph; and 3 aquatints (2 with lift ground aquatint and 1 with soft ground etching

Title: Un Poème dans Chaque Livre
